briefdescription.para: This function check if the device is in IDLE state.
Callback function, from Phy to Higher level (still in interrupt handler)
This function setup the netdev_t device.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer on the PHY device context

briefdescription.para: This function initialize the netdev_t and phy devices.

parameterdescription.para: Event call-back to upper layer (still in interrupt)

briefdescription.para: This function de-initialize the netdev_t and phy devices.
This function send the given message.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer on structure that hold the message

briefdescription.para: This function get the received message.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer on structure that will hold the message

briefdescription.para: This function open a listen window.
This function Get/Set internal configuration variable.

parameterdescription.para: Id of configuration variable to get/set (see netdev_ctl_e)
scalar or pointer that hold the value to set/get

briefdescription.para: This file implement all required function to access network device (aka. netdev_t).
